RegisterStateHandler Class Reference

This class is responsible for initializing telephony and registering the user with an SIP registrar, including gathering SIP account information from the user, initiating registration, and verifying successful registration. More...

Detailed Description

This class is responsible for initializing telephony and registering the user with an SIP registrar, including gathering SIP account information from the user, initiating registration, and verifying successful registration.

Member Function Documentation

void RegisterStateHandler::Enter (  )  [virtual]

Acquires registration data from user, calls TeleKarma's TeleKarma#Initialize(const PString &, const PString &) method, and initiates registration.

Enter the register state and prompt for the user's info to register.

Reimplemented from StateHandler.

void RegisterStateHandler::Exit (  )  [virtual]

Does nothing.

Nothing extra do to when we exit the RegisterState.

Reimplemented from StateHandler.

void RegisterStateHandler::In (  )  [virtual]

Checks registration state until timeout.

Attempt to register when we are in the RegisterState.

Forwards to menu state upon success, or exit state if registration fails.

Reimplemented from StateHandler.
